mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectInfAffClm Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ AFF_ORD_SN , AFF_ORD_TURN , AFF_CLM_TURN , AFF_CLM_DT , AFF_CLM_NO , AFF_CLM_ITM_NO , CSTMR_NM , MOBIL_NATION_NO , MOBIL_AREA_NO , MOBIL_TLOF_NO , MOBIL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , TEL_NATION_NO , TEL_AREA_NO , TEL_TLOF_NO , TEL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , RTRVL_NATION_CD , CSTMR_POST_NO , CSTMR_BASE_ADDR , CSTMR_DETAIL_ADDR , RTRVL_SHOP_NO , DLV_MEMO , GOD_MEMO , MALL_ID , CLM_NO , CLM_WRHS_GOD_TURN , ERP_GOD_NO , GOD_NO , ITM_NO , PCKAGESHAPE_GOD_NO , QTY , CRNCY_CD , PAY_EXCHG_RT_CRNCY_AMT , RTL_PRC , CSMR_PRC , AFF_COM_SALE_PRC , DLV_CST , COM_DLV_CST , TMALL_GLB_LMTT_INV_USE_YN , TMALL_EVT_LMTT_INV_USE_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM INF_AFF_CLM WHERE 1 = 1 AND AFF_ORD_SN = #{affOrdSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND AFF_ORD_TURN = #{affOrdTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND AFF_CLM_TURN = #{affClmTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
